english.segment1: It's like I've got nothing to do but think about you (all I can do, all I can do)
english.segment2: everyday is a new day. and I don't have to pretend. all my friends think I'm crazy. but I don't want this to end
english.segment3: when I have the chance I wanna say to u. wishing I could take back what I put u thru. I'll never do it again. we're like oil and water still we somehow mix. and what used to be broken is somehow fixed. it's hard to explain
english.segment4: I know some people say. that opposites attract. if that's the truth then we. we will be together forever
english.segment5: (chorus). it's like I got nothing to do but think about u. I've got all the time in the world. if you look in my heart. u'll know from the start. that's its all I can do. not to think about u
english.segment6: I gave you good reason. to walk out that door. let me tell you I've learned a thing or two
english.segment7: and I'm so amazed at the things u do. now dont let me go oh no
english.segment8: I know some people say. that opposites attract. if that's the truth then we, we're meant to be together forever
english.segment10: I know some people say. that opposites attract. if that's the truth then we, we belong together forever
